about_the_game:
Embark on a nostalgic adventure with Freak Hunter A Retro Type and relive the excitement of old-school platform games. This unique game allows you to become a hunter in a world of zombies and mysterious creatures, whether in single-player or co-op mode.

Navigate through suspended platforms, discovering a world filled with gold, weapons, and secrets. As the "Freak Hunter," hone your combat skills to the max, overcome traps, vanquish enemies, and utilize all your abilities to prove yourself. Each action-packed moment will evoke the thrill of being a true platform hero.

Yet the fun doesn't stop there. Freak Hunter A Retro Type opens the door to your creativity. Design your own levels and shape platforms as you wish. By placing zombies, creatures, and surprises, invite players to take on challenges. Showcase how far you can go in the world you've crafted!

Freak Hunter A Retro Type doesn't just offer entertainment—it revives nostalgia. With its retro graphics, immersive gameplay, and inventive level design, this game will provide you with unforgettable moments. From single-player adventures to co-op battles, become the fearless hunter in the realm of zombies and creatures!

Are you prepared to become a true platform hero with Freak Hunter A Retro Type? Step into the world of zombies and mysterious creatures, and revel in thrilling adventures and creative design!

Game Features:
- Single player combat mode
- Co-op combat mode
- PvP encounter mode
- Episode design mode
- Steam achievements
- Augmented physics calculation engine
- Ability to push, pull, break interactive boxes
- Fluent animations that look cute

highlighted.name: Kill the enemy by detonating TNT
Design a level for artificial intelligence

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP Sp3, 7, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Any Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: .Net FrameWork 4.0, XNA Game FrameWork 4.0
